## Feature Summary
Provide a clear, concise description of the feature you'd like to see implemented.

## Problem Statement
**What problem does this feature solve?**
- Describe the current limitation or pain point
- Explain the impact on users or developers
- Include specific use cases where this feature would help

## Proposed Solution
**Describe the solution you'd like to see implemented:**
- High-level overview of the feature
- Expected behavior and user experience
- Integration points with existing DeepV components

## Technical Details
**Implementation considerations:**
- Which DeepV module(s) would this affect? (cleaning, vectorization, refinement, merging, etc.)
- Required dependencies or external libraries
- Performance implications
- Backward compatibility requirements

## Alternative Approaches
**Have you considered alternative solutions?**
- List other ways to solve this problem
- Why is your proposed solution preferable?
- Trade-offs of different approaches

## Testing & Validation
**How should this feature be tested?**
- Unit tests required
- Integration tests needed
- Benchmarking requirements
- Example datasets or use cases

## Priority & Impact
**Feature priority assessment:**
- [ ] **Critical**: Blocks important use cases or fixes major limitations
- [ ] **High**: Significantly improves user experience or developer productivity
- [ ] **Medium**: Useful enhancement with clear benefits
- [ ] **Low**: Nice-to-have improvement with minimal impact
- [ ] **Future**: Interesting idea for long-term roadmap

**Target release phase:**
- [ ] Phase 4 (Production-ready)
- [ ] Phase 5 (Advanced features)
- [ ] Future consideration

## Additional Context
**Supporting information:**
- Screenshots, diagrams, or mockups
- Links to similar features in other projects
- Research papers or technical references
- Related issues or discussions

## Implementation Readiness
**Your willingness to contribute:**
- [ ] I can implement this feature
- [ ] I can help with testing
- [ ] I can provide guidance/requirements
- [ ] I need help with implementation
- [ ] This is just a suggestion

**Estimated complexity:**
- [ ] Small (few hours, single file changes)
- [ ] Medium (days, multiple modules)
- [ ] Large (weeks, architectural changes)
- [ ] Unknown
